channel.title: [508] Commands and need help with freinds list 2 work [508]
channel.description:
I need these commands :
::reset - resets ur stats. all 2 1 ::lvl - lvls you up like ::lvl 0 99 -99 att ::ipban - ipban some one of ur server and i need friend list : 2 work

item.title: [508] Commands and need help with freinds list 2 work [508]
item.dc:creator: @norbit119 norbit119
item.description:
@norbit119 wrote:

well i think mines is right it works 100% in my 508[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 18, 2009, 03:33:15 pm[/size][hr]This is 100% right)

		if (cmd[0].equals("lvl")) {
			Misc.println("cmd: "+playerCommand+" "+cmd[0]);
			if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 9) {
				p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot level this skill, Please ask an administrator for a Fletching guide.");
				return;
			}
                            if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 16) {
                            return;
                            }
                            if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 15) {
                            return;
                            }
                            if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 14) {
                            return;
                            }            
                            if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 13) {
                            return;
                            }
                            if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 12) {
                            return;
                            }
                            if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 10) {                                
                            p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot level this skill");
                            return;
                            } 
			if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 17) {
				p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot level this skill, Please ask an administrator for a Thieving guide.");
				return;
			}
			p.appendExperience(Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));
		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("reset")) {
			p.skillLvl[Integer.parseInt(cmd[1])] = 1;
			p.skillXP[Integer.parseInt(cmd[1])] = 0;
			p.getActionSender().setSkillLvl(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));
			p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
			p.updateReq = true;
		}

item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

         if (cmd[0].equals("lvl")) {
            Misc.println("cmd: "+playerCommand+" "+cmd[0]);
            if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 9) {
               p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot level this skill, Please ask an administrator for a Fletching guide.");
               return;
            }
                                if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 16) {
                                return;
                                }
                                if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 15) {
                                return;
                                }
                                if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 14) {
                                return;
                                }           
                                if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 13) {
                                return;
                                }
                                if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 12) {
                                return;
                                }
                                if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 10) {                               
                                p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot level this skill");
                                return;
                                }
            if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 17) {
               p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot level this skill, Please ask an administrator for a Thieving guide.");
               return;
            }

Whoa, what?
That doesn’t exactly look like what he asked for.

if (cmd[0].equals("lvl") {
    p.appendExperience(Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));
}

Reset looks right though.
For IP ban you’ll have to tell us how you’re storing the names of banned characters.

item.title: [508] Commands and need help with freinds list 2 work [508]
item.dc:creator: @norbit119 norbit119
item.description:
@norbit119 wrote:

ok ill help you this time here [br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 18, 2009, 12:49:29 pm[/size][hr] if (cmd[0].equals(“lvl”)) {
Misc.println("cmd: “+playerCommand+” "+cmd[0]);
if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 9) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You cannot level this skill, Please ask an administrator for a Fletching guide.”);
return;
}
if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 16) {
return;
}
if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 15) {
return;
}
if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 14) {
return;
}
if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 13) {
return;
}
if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 12) {
return;
}
if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 10) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You cannot level this skill”);
return;
}
if (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]) == 17) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You cannot level this skill, Please ask an administrator for a Thieving guide.”);
return;
}
p.appendExperience(Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));
}
if (cmd[0].equals(“reset”)) {
p.skillLvl[Integer.parseInt(cmd[1])] = 1;
p.skillXP[Integer.parseInt(cmd[1])] = 0;
p.getActionSender().setSkillLvl(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));
p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
p.updateReq = true;
}
